fields.name: Report from Sheriff Caleb Beckett
fields.description: "A witness came to my office and reported that our suspect could have been injured."

fields.name: Weapon Transcript
fields.description: "I did not get a close look at the weapon, but it looked metal."

fields.name: Footprints
fields.description: You notice some interesting footprints. It looks like the criminal has a bad leg.

fields.name: Weapon Clue
fields.description: "I noticed that he was carrying something blunt."

fields.name: Overheard Talk
fields.description:
You overheard someone describe the suspect like this. 

"He could have been alive when that tree was planted."
